data.message: I love Eminem couldn't decide as I love them all. He sexy as fuck wouldn't mind Eminem as my own. I would make him really happy

I dont know how you were raised, I was taught to keep it respectful. Relationship to me is 100% all about your other half. No one else. Not even a fantasy.

Oh honey, I'm the most faithful woman on earth, however I'm not going to be judging anyone just because they fantasize about another human being.... They are just fantasies, it's in the mind.. It's natural... We're humans.. That's what we do..
HOWEVER, the second you act on those fantasies, that's when the line gets crossed... But until then, let the mind run wild.
